summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the south 113 feet of the alley in block 49, S.A. Bell's 2nd Addition, extending from Pine Street North, and between Boren Avenue and Minor Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9291 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
